title: 语态
content:
【语态】:

  •     【含义】：动词的一种形式, 用于表示主语与谓语的关系.

  •     【种类】：

  •         【主动语态】:

  •         【被动语态】:

  •             一般现在时(am\is\are done):

  •                 English is spoken in many countries as a second language.

  •                 英语在许多国家被当作第二语言使用

  •             一般将来时(will be done):

  •                 The truth will be known by everyone

  •                 真相将会被所有人知道

  •             一般过去时(was\were done):

  •                 The house was built in the 19th century

  •                 这座房子是在19世纪建造的

  •             现在进行时(am\is\are being done):

  •                 The problems are being solved by the engineering team

  •                 工程团队正在解决这些问题

  •             过去进行时(was\were being done):

  •                 The equipment was being repaired by the technicians throughout the weekend

  •                 整个周末 技术人员一直在修理设备

  •             现在完成时(have\has been done):

  •                 The concert tickets have been sold out for weeks

  •                 音乐会的门票已经在几周前售罄

  •             过去完成时(had been done):

  •                 The news has been made known to the public before the official announcement

  •                 官宣之前, 新闻已经被公众知晓

  •             虚拟语气(should be done):

  •                 He urges that the restrictions should be lifted

  •                 他敦促取消这些限制

  •         【使动语态】:

  •             make(使):

  •                 Learning makes me happy

  •                 学习使我快乐

  •             have(让某人做某事):

  •                 Please have him come here

  •                 请叫他到这里来

  •             let(使):

  •                 Let's go 开始

  •                 leave(让某人继续处于某种状态): Don't leave her waiting outside in the rain
